text: The exploitation behind clothes consists of the racial, social and gender injustices happening with the production of clothes, especially in Bangladesh. Women and children are forced to work in poor conditions. == 2013 Dhaka garment factory collapse == The 2013 Dhaka garment factory collapse was a structural failure that occurred on 24 April 2013 in the Savar Upazila of Dhaka District, Bangladesh. == Criticism == Jon Kareaga, Spanish activist, fights against fast fashion that affects Bangladesh garment industry. == Notes == == References == Category:Fashion Category:Clothing controversies Category:Economy of Bangladesh
